item.title: 4 reasons why we can and must fight terrorism and poverty through climate action
item.description:
4 reasons why we can and must fight terrorism and poverty through climate action

Soon after the Sept. 11, 2001, terrorist attacks in New York City, then-President George W. Bush offered the view that "we fight against poverty because hope is the answer to terror." Bush himself never followed through in advancing a serious global anti-poverty agenda.
